Operation 'get_/' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, unclear_purpose. Original summary is misleading - it doesn't clarify that this endpoint performs color matching/lookup rather than simply listing all colors. Description lacks clarity on input parameters (hex values) and what 'distance' represents. Added context about hex input, matching behavior, and use case for AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Get all colors of the default color name list
data.current_description: Returns an array of colors from the specified list, with distance calculations to show how close each match is to the requested colors. When providing multiple values, the endpoint will find the closest match for each color.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve color names with distance calculations
data.description_suggestion: Returns an array of color objects from the default color name list with distance calculations showing how closely each color matches the requested hex value(s). Accepts one or more hex color values as input and returns the closest matching color names from the list along with their distance metrics. Useful for finding color name matches and understanding color similarity.
data.reasoning: Original summary is misleading - it doesn't clarify that this endpoint performs color matching/lookup rather than simply listing all colors. Description lacks clarity on input parameters (hex values) and what 'distance' represents. Added context about hex input, matching behavior, and use case for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get_/names/' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, unclear_purpose. Summary is identical to another operation, creating confusion. Description is completely empty. Added clarity that this is a full list retrieval (not a search/match operation), specified return structure, and distinguished it from the matching endpoint for AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Get all colors of the default color name list
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all colors from default color name list
data.description_suggestion: Returns a complete array of all color objects available in the default color name list. Each color object includes the hex value, color name, and related metadata. This endpoint provides access to the full color naming reference without filtering or matching.
data.reasoning: Summary is identical to another operation, creating confusion. Description is completely empty. Added clarity that this is a full list retrieval (not a search/match operation), specified return structure, and distinguished it from the matching endpoint for AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/lists/' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, inconsistent_terminology. Summary is misleading - this operation returns metadata about available lists, not colors themselves. Inconsistent with the description which correctly describes list metadata. Improved summary to clarify the operation's actual purpose and added context about use case for AI agents.

data.current_summary: Get all colors of the default color name list
data.current_description: Returns a list of available color name lists with descriptions and URLs to the color list endpoints.
data.description_suggestion: Returns metadata for all available color name lists including list names, descriptions, and endpoint URLs. Use this to discover which predefined color lists are available and access their respective endpoints.
data.reasoning: Summary is misleading - this operation returns metadata about available lists, not colors themselves. Inconsistent with the description which correctly describes list metadata. Improved summary to clarify the operation's actual purpose and added context about use case for AI agents.
